children: Cardboard and flattened cardboard boxes go in the recycling.
Next to bin â€“ no charge
Cardboard that doesn't fit can go next to your bin on your recycling day. Bundle and set next to the bin, or put in a box or container next to your bin.
There is no charge for extra recycling.
Cardboard with grease or oil stains (like pizza boxes) go in the food and yard waste bin.
Put cardboard that is mostly wet in the food and yard waste bin.
